name: DZS Inc.
description: DZS Inc. is a global provider of broadband connectivity and communications solutions. Founded in 2015, the company specializes in high-performance networking solutions designed to meet the demands of modern communication networks. DZS focuses on delivering innovative technologies that enable service providers and enterprises to enhance their network capabilities, offering products in the areas of optical transport, broadband access, and software solutions. Their portfolio includes a range of hardware and software designed to support high-speed internet, cloud services, and advanced telecommunications infrastructure. DZS is committed to driving the evolution of network technologies to support the ever-increasing demand for bandwidth and connectivity, leveraging its expertise in optical, wireless, and cloud-based solutions. The company serves a diverse client base, including telecommunications operators, cable companies, and enterprises across various sectors. With a vision to connect the world through advanced technology, DZS aims to empower its customers with the tools they need to thrive in a rapidly changing digital landscape.

faq.answer: Hank Kwiatkowski is the CEO of DZS Inc.

faq.question: Where is DZS headquartered?
faq.answer: DZS is headquartered in Richardson, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does DZS offer?
faq.answer: DZS offers broadband access solutions, optical transport equipment, and network management software.
